titles.title: He Took The Chains From My Heart And Set Me Free

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He took the chains from my heart, and He set me free,
He gives me joy; now I'm happy as can be;
He took me out of Satan's hand,
Set my feet on higher ground,
He took the chains from my heart, and He set me free.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He took the chains from my feet, and He set me free,
He gives me peace; now I walk in liberty;
He took me out of Satan's hand,
Set my feet on higher ground,
He took the chains from my feet, and He set me free.
